meanings.definition: The quality or state of being artificial.
meanings.sent1: The artificiality of the plastic flowers made them look fake.
meanings.sent2: The artificiality of the intelligence in robots can be fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The artificiality of the cake made of cardboard fooled everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The artificiality of her smile was evident to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The artificiality of the painting made it hard to believe it was created by a human.

meanings.definition: The fact or quality of being artificial; artificial nature.
meanings.sent1: The artificiality of the synthetic fabric was evident in its texture.
meanings.sent2: The artificiality of the flavors in the processed food was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The artificiality of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The artificiality of the city lights created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The artificiality of the sound effects made the movie more exciting.
